main.name: Prathamesh
main.description: I love to build amazing web-apps with React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Prathamesh! I've been coding for over 5 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey, I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their business ideas.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: Specialize in creating high-converting websites that help your business grow. I've helped many businesses to generate thousands of dollars in revenue.

projects.title: Flipkart Clone (React.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Stripe)
Twitter Clone (React.js, Sanity CMS, Tailwind CSS)
Amazon Clone - (React.js, Material-UI, Express, Stripe, Firebase)

testimonials.text: Extremely pleased with Mr Prathamesh Chavan as he has managed to achieve all the requirements that I have set including the deliverable of the project within a short amount of time.
Very good to work with him. Very good knowledge in React, tailwind and related technology. Did the job extremely well .
